argumentText:
ARGUMENT
c y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | scmatrhmval.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | scmatrhmval.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 3 |  | scmatrhmval.o | |- .1. = ( 1r ` A ) |
| 4 |  | scmatrhmval.t | |- .* = ( .s ` A ) |
| 5 |  | scmatrhmval.f | |- F = ( x e. K |-> ( x .* .1. ) ) |
| 6 |  | scmatrhmval.c | |- C = ( N ScMat R ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_scmatf | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> F : K --> C ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` A ) = ( Base ` A ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 8, 3, 4, 6 | #P_scmatscmid | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ y e. C ) -> E. c e. K y = ( c .* .1. ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_3expa | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ y e. C ) -> E. c e. K y = ( c .* .1. ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_scmatrhmval | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ c e. K ) -> ( F ` c ) = ( c .* .1. ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantll | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ c e. K ) -> ( F ` c ) = ( c .* .1. ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ c e. K ) -> ( c .* .1. ) = ( F ` c ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ c e. K ) -> ( y = ( c .* .1. ) <-> y = ( F ` c ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_biimpd | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ c e. K ) -> ( y = ( c .* .1. ) -> y = ( F ` c ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_reximdva | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( E. c e. K y = ( c .* .1. ) -> E. c e. K y = ( F ` c ) ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ y e. C ) -> ( E. c e. K y = ( c .* .1. ) -> E. c e. K y = ( F ` c ) ) ) |
| 18 | 10, 17 | #P_mpd | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ y e. C ) -> E. c e. K y = ( F ` c ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> A. y e. C E. c e. K y = ( F ` c ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_dffo3 | |- ( F : K -onto-> C <-> ( F : K --> C /\ A. y e. C E. c e. K y = ( F ` c ) ) ) |
| 21 | 7, 19, 20 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> F : K -onto-> C ) |
